snippet: Servando Gómez, the head of Mexico’s feared Knights Templar drug cartel, reflected in an interview on his transition from schoolteacher to organized crime boss.
abstract: Servando Gómez, the head of Mexico’s feared Knights Templar drug cartel, reflected in an interview on his transition from schoolteacher to organized crime boss.

headline.main: Teaching Just Wasn't Right for Him, Head of Mexican Drug Cartel Says
